actions.text: Amendment SA 80 under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 87.

Amendment SA 80 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S1156-1159) To make a categorical exclusion available for use on certain land by States and Indian Tribes through a project delivery program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 80 proposed by Senator Lee.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 80 under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 87.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 80 under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 87.

purpose: To make a categorical exclusion available for use on certain land by States and Indian Tribes through a project delivery program.
